oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of Proposed Development - Midan Ismail
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Badeau, John S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Map drawn by AUC President John S. Badeau showing proposed architectural plans for Ismail Square (now Tahrir Square).
